text:
="preserve">Stoyan Alexandrov (, 14 June 1949 – 24 August 2020) was a Bulgarian economist. He was the Minister of Finance under Prime Minister Lyuben Berov between 1992 to 1994. He also was President of the Governing Council of the Association of Commerce Banks.
Alexandrov died on 24 August 2020 in Sofia at the age of 71.
